verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Make <S%H6213><s%> you two <S%H8147><s%> trumpets <S%H2689><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> of a whole <S%H4749><s%> piece shall you make <S%H6213><s%> them: that you may use them for the calling <S%H4744><s%> of the assembly, <S%H5712><s%> and for the journeying <S%H4550><s%> of the camps. <S%H4264><s%>

And when they shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with them, all <S%H3605><s%> the assembly <S%H5712><s%> shall assemble <S%H3259><s%> themselves to you at <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> they blow <S%H8628><s%> but with one <S%H259><s%> trumpet, then the princes, <S%H5387><s%> which are heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall gather <S%H3259><s%> themselves to you.
When you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm, <S%H8643><s%> then the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> parts shall go <S%H5265><s%> forward. <S%H5265><s%>

When you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time, then the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the south <S%H8486><s%> side shall take their journey: <S%H5265><s%> they shall blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> for their journeys. <S%H4550><s%>
But when the congregation <S%H6951><s%> is to be gathered <S%H6950><s%> together, you shall blow, <S%H8628><s%> but you shall not sound <S%H7321><s%> an alarm. <S%H7321><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with the trumpets; <S%H2689><s%> and they shall be to you for an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> that oppresses <S%H6887><s%> you, then you shall blow <S%H7321><s%> an alarm <S%H7321><s%> with the trumpets; <S%H2689><s%> and you shall be remembered <S%H2142><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> from your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your gladness, <S%H8057><s%> and in your solemn <S%H4150><s%> days, and in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months, <S%H2320><s%> you shall blow <S%H8628><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and over the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings; that they may be to you for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken <S%H5927><s%> up from off <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony. <S%H5715><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took their journeys <S%H4550><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai; <S%H5514><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> rested <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran. <S%H6290><s%>
And they first <S%H7223><s%> took their journey <S%H5265><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> place went <S%H5265><s%> the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their armies: <S%H6635><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> his host was Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>

And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> was Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar. <S%H6686><s%>
And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> was Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon. <S%H2497><s%>

And the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was taken <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1647><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies: <S%H6635><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> his host <S%H6635><s%> was Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur. <S%H7707><s%>

And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> was Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai. <S%H6701><s%>
And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> was Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel. <S%H1845><s%>

And the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> and the other did set <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> against <S%H5704><s%> they came. <S%H935><s%>

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies: <S%H6635><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> his host <S%H6635><s%> was Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>

And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur. <S%H6301><s%>
And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni. <S%H1441><s%>

And the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> which was the rear guard <S%H622><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the camps <S%H4264><s%> throughout their hosts: <S%H6635><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> his host <S%H6635><s%> was Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai. <S%H5993><s%>
And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> was Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ocran. <S%H5918><s%>
And over <S%H5921><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> was Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan. <S%H5881><s%>
Thus <S%H428><s%> were the journeys <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their armies, <S%H6635><s%> when they set <S%H5265><s%> forward. <S%H5265><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Hobab, <S%H2246><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Raguel <S%H7467><s%> the Midianite, <S%H4084><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> We are journeying <S%H5265><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it you: come <S%H3212><s%> you with us, and we will do you good: <S%H2895><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, I will not go; <S%H3212><s%> but I will depart <S%H3212><s%> to my own land, <S%H776><s%> and to my kindred. <S%H4138><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Leave <S%H5800><s%> us not, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you; for as much <S%H3588><s%> as you know <S%H3045><s%> how we are to encamp <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and you may be to us instead <S%H8478><s%> of eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And it shall be, if <S%H3588><s%> you go <S%H3212><s%> with us, yes, it shall be, that what <S%H834><s%> goodness <S%H2896><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H3190><s%> to us, the same will we do <S%H3190><s%> to you.

And they departed <S%H5265><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey: <S%H1870><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them in the three <S%H7969><s%> days' <S%H3117><s%> journey, <S%H1870><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> out a resting <S%H4496><s%> place for them.
And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was on them by day, <S%H3119><s%> when they went <S%H5265><s%> out of the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the ark <S%H727><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> forward, <S%H5265><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Rise <S%H6965><s%> up, LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and let your enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and let them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you.
And when it rested, <S%H5117><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Return, <S%H7725><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to the many <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
